location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 124 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor for the Public Department, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses several administrative and financial matters including sales of wool. In the letter Galley requests to be relieved of his post and to return to Bombay on account of ill-health which has gone on for months and prevented him completing monthly accounts for November.
